title: Login problem

The EUNE login issue is being addressed on the EU boards and being updated as we have more information. You can find the post [here](http://boards.eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-en/vIIOYAMo-updated-1648-03-07-16-eune-login-issues-02-07-16).

Let me know if you have any questions.
